headline: Dow Jones Futures: Stocks Extend Pause; Cisco, McDonald's, AppLovin Lead Earnings Movers

headline: McDonald's (MCD) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Christopher Kempczinski: Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you for joining us today.  In 2025, McDonald's delivered system-wide sales of nearly $140 billion, up 5.5% in constant currency for the full year.  This reflects solid comp sales growth of more than 3% for the full year and over 5.5% in the fourth quarter with strong growth across all segments.

content.title: McDonald's (MCD) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
content.summary: Christopher Kempczinski: Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you for joining us today.  In 2025, McDonald's delivered system-wide sales of nearly $140 billion, up 5.5% in constant currency for the full year.  This reflects solid comp sales growth of more than 3% for the full year and over 5.5% in the fourth quarter with strong growth across all segments.

thumbnail.caption: Logo of jester cap with thought bubble.

headline: McDonald's Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) executives told investors the company exited 2025 with “strong momentum” and reiterated plans to accelerate restaurant growth and lean on a “three for three” playbook of value, marketing, and menu innovation in 2026. Systemwide sales growth and expanding footprint CEO Chris Ke

headline: Mizuho Lifts McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) PT to $325 but Flags Uncertain 2026 Upside
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is included among the 13 Best Roth IRA Stocks to Buy Now. On February 6, Mizuho raised its price recommendation on McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) to $325 from $300. It maintained a Neutral rating on the stock. headline: McDonald’s ends 2025 with higher revenue as sales rise across regions
summary: The company reported Q4 2025 net income of $2.16bn, up 7% from $2.017bn a year earlier.

content.title: McDonald’s ends 2025 with higher revenue as sales rise across regions
content.summary: The company reported Q4 2025 net income of $2.16bn, up 7% from $2.017bn a year earlier.

thumbnail.caption: McDonald's reported a 4% year-on-year increase in consolidated revenue for 2025. Credit: Summer_Wind / Shutterstock.com.

headline: MCD Q4 Deep Dive: Value Strategy, Menu Innovation, and Expansion Shape Outlook
summary: Fast-food chain McDonald’s (NYSE:MCD) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 9.7% year on year to $7.01 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.12 per share was 2.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: MCD Q4 Deep Dive: Value Strategy, Menu Innovation, and Expansion Shape Outlook
content.summary: Fast-food chain McDonald’s (NYSE:MCD) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 9.7% year on year to $7.01 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.12 per share was 2.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Stocks to Watch Thursday: Cisco, McDonald's, AppLovin
summary: ↘️ Cisco (CSCO): The networking-equipment company logged higher revenue due to increasing AI hyperscaler demand. Shares fell about 7.5% in premarket trading, however, after a strong run for the stock so far in 2026.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Thursday: Cisco, McDonald's, AppLovin

headline: US stocks edge higher following mixed profit reports from big companies
summary: U.S. stocks are ticking higher and once again flirting with a record following mixed profit reports from big companies.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 179 points, and the Nasdaq composite climbed 0.3%.  AppLovin and Cisco Systems fell after their reports.

content.title: US stocks edge higher following mixed profit reports from big companies
content.summary: U.S. stocks are ticking higher and once again flirting with a record following mixed profit reports from big companies.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 179 points, and the Nasdaq composite climbed 0.3%.  AppLovin and Cisco Systems fell after their reports.

thumbnail.caption: Trader Edward McCarthy works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange, Wednesday, Feb. 11, 2026. (AP Photo/Richard Drew)
